org.productivity.java.habitat4j.common.sax
Class AbstractBaseHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      org.productivity.java.habitat4j.common.sax.AbstractBaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, Habitat4JConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
PropertyListHandler, ServerIdentityHandler
public abstract class AbstractBaseHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements Habitat4JConstants

Abstract class used for handling the parsing of XML files and resources.

getXsdValidationPath

protected java.lang.String getXsdValidationPath(java.util.Hashtable features,
                                                java.lang.String featureXsdValidation,
                                                java.lang.String defaultXsdPath)
This method returns the XSD validation resource path based on Habitat4JFeatures information.

Parameters:
features - - the Habitat4JFeatures Hashtable
featureXsdValidation - - the name of the Habitat4JFeature to look up
defaultXsdPath - - the default XSD path
Returns:
Returns the XSD validation resource path.
